dashboard.label: Data Rebalance
dashboard.description: Rebalance data distribution across an indexer cluster

html.p: Data Rebalance ensures even data distribution across the peers in an indexer cluster. Bucket copies are redistributed such that each peer has approximately the same number of buckets, rounded to the specified threshold. All buckets including searchable, primary and non-searchable buckets are balanced. This enables search traffic to be distributed evenly across all the peers in the indexer cluster.

ul.li: Data is redistributed such that each peer has approximately the same number of buckets, rounded to the specified threshold
